str2: David, King of Israel. Of Hebrew origin; Dabid, the Israelite king.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.
Even as, just as. From katha and per; exactly as.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Regarding as happy, blessed, or enviable. From makarizo; beatification, i.e. Attribution of good fortune.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular

str2: A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To reckon, count, charge with; reason, decide, conclude; think, suppose.
Apart from, separately from; without. Adverb from chora; at a space, i.e. Separately or apart from.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.
